definitions.meaning: 结果或影响（某事导致的变化或后果）
definitions.usage: 用作名词，指某行动、事件或情况导致的结果或影响，常用于描述因果关系中的后果。

examples.scene: 一位学生在准备期末考试时，发现减少玩手机的时间后，学习成绩显著提高。
examples.chineseIdea: 减少手机使用时间对学习成绩产生了积极的影响。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: Cutting down on phone use @ @ @ her academic performance.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: Cutting down on phone use 「had a positive effect on」 her academic performance.
examples.chineseTranslation: 减少手机使用时间「对她的学业表现产生了积极影响」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Reduce phone time affects her study good.' 纠正：'Cutting down on phone time has a positive effect on her academic performance.'

examples.scene: 一家公司实施了新的环保政策，几个月后发现能源消耗显著减少。
examples.chineseIdea: 新的环保政策开始生效，带来了节能的成果。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The new environmental policy @ @ after a few months, reducing energy consumption.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The new environmental policy 「took effect」 after a few months, reducing energy consumption.
examples.chineseTranslation: 新环保政策几个月后「生效」，降低了能源消耗。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'New policy works after months.' 纠正：'The new environmental policy took effect after a few months.'

definitions.meaning: 效果或印象（某事在视觉、听觉或情感上产生的感受）
definitions.usage: 用作名词，指某事物在感官或情感上产生的效果，常用于描述艺术、设计或表达的整体印象。

examples.scene: 一位室内设计师在装修客厅时，选择了暖色调的灯光和木质家具，营造出温馨的氛围。
examples.chineseIdea: 通过灯光和家具的选择，设计师创造了一种舒适的氛围。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The warm lighting and wooden furniture @ @ @ of coziness in the living room.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The warm lighting and wooden furniture 「created an effect」 of coziness in the living room.
examples.chineseTranslation: 暖色调的灯光和木质家具「营造出一种温馨的效果」在客厅里。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Warm lights and furniture make cozy feeling.' 纠正：'The warm lighting and wooden furniture create an effect of coziness.'

examples.scene: 一位电影导演在拍摄高潮场面时，使用了慢镜头和震撼的背景音乐，让观众感到紧张和震撼。
examples.chineseIdea: 导演通过慢镜头和音乐制造了强烈的戏剧性冲击。
examples.sentenceWithBlank: The slow-motion scene with intense music added a @ @ to the movie's climax.
examples.fullEnglishSentence: The slow-motion scene with intense music added a 「dramatic effect」 to the movie's climax.
examples.chineseTranslation: 慢镜头场景搭配激烈的音乐为电影的高潮增添了「戏剧性的效果」。
examples.chinglishFix: 典型中式英语：'Slow motion and music give strong feeling.' 纠正：'The slow-motion scene with intense music added a dramatic effect.'
